Integrated Urgent Care Technical Standards

Purpose

These standards outline technical, interoperability, and information requirements for systems and services operating within the English NHS Urgent Care system.

Contents

Messaging
  • Ambulance Requests
  • Interoperability Tool Kit (ITK)
  • Transfer of Care (NHS 111 CDA)
National Services
  • Child Protection Information System
  • Directory of Services
  • Personal Demographics Service
  • Repeat Caller Service
  • Summary Care Record
